attributes.action: Gordon brown to resign from office
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: please sign this petition for Gordon Brown to resign from office as he as no mandate to run our country.Also he he as not kept his work on a referendrum with europe and a vote of now confidence should be held.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
